import React, {PureComponent} from 'react'; import {Form, Input, Tabs, Checkbox, Button} from "antd"; import {withRouter} from "react-router"; import loginStyle from './index.module.css'; import {LockOutlined, ScanOutlined, UserOutlined, VerifiedOutlined} from "@ant-design/icons"; import RandomCode from "../RandomCode"; const {TabPane} = Tabs; class Login extends PureComponent { state={autoComplete:'off'} render() { return (
} placeholder='请输入企业标识' autoComplete={this.state.autoComplete==='off'?'off':'organization'}/> } placeholder='请输入登录账号' autoComplete='username'/> } placeholder='请输入登录密码' autoComplete='current-password'/>
记住密码
自动登录
} placeholder='请输入登录邮箱' autoComplete='username'/> } placeholder='请输入登录密码' autoComplete='current-password'/>

); } } export default withRouter(Login);
